ComicInfo.Title: Anthony; Big Little Brother; Kanata & Mistress Renge
ComicInfo.Summary:
Kanata And Mistress Renge: A young boy learns swordsmanship from an older female, among other things.
Do-It-Yourself Porno Home Video: A male and a female try to make a sex tape.
Big Little Brother: Marge is agreeable to a threesome between her, her date and his little brother, until she learns that Jim's little brother isn't so little.
Lunch In The Park: ANThony tries to consume an ant crawling on the back of a woman on a park bench without disturbing her.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:52. [Issue ID 226551]
